name: Polar Opposites (YnknownNumber)
description:
Pitch

Polar opposites is a visual novel about the duality of one's mind. If you were to wake up with no memory of your past, which one would you follow? Your instincts? Or your reason? 

Game with several endings and a couple hints scattered throughout all branches.

Credits to

Game design, writing, programmation: Louise Birckel (a.k.a YnknownNumber)

Character designs : Electronic Arts' The Sims 4

Backgrounds : Electronic Arts' The Sims 4
